title: How Do I buy Team Fire Icon for Fire Finishers?

replies.body: The Team Fire icon was available during All-Stars 2015 and not currently purchasable.  While the [location ](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/2016-all-star-event-heads-barcelona)for this year's All-stars has been announced, I don't have any information on content for it.  Keep an eye out on our [news page ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/)for updates on this as we draw closer.
